showScoreExcerpt:
“Themes about loss, living in the past, burying regrets and obviating the present ring with profound truth and humanity that we all can identify with. Indeed, though Rebeck couches her themes with humor, and Danny DeVito shines as he teases out the riotous laughs, Sam’s condition is dire. Perhaps, it is more universal than we would like to admit...This is a must-see, especially for DeVito’s performance. In one segment he plays the board game Sorry. Gobsmacking!”
